Name: PUZZLE: OCEAN
About the game: PUZZLE: OCEAN - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and get a picture of different marine fauna. You need to collect from the small pictures one big and after you may to going at the new level Features: Simple controls (mouse) Relaxing soundtrack. Beautiful pictures of marine fauna. Gameplay for children and adults. Credits: Programming: AFBIK Studio Music and effects: zapsplat Pictures: Internet
